trends: There have been no other sightings in Kohler
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Wittnessed an unknown object in the sky traveling from northeast to southwest
divs: Sighting DetailsThere was a large group of people gathered to watch fireworks in Kohler, WI on July 4th. Just before the fireworks started at 10:00 p.m. someone pointed out an object in the sky. It looked like a fireball and was traveling from the northeast to the southwest. Was still watching it when the fireworks started. I did video it with my Iphone for a few minutes.
